plot: A woman claiming to be Mal's wife appears aboard Serenity.

Mal and his crew goes to a planet and they party with the locals. When the Serenity leaves the planet, Mal finds a beautiful woman named Saffron sneaking in the ship and who tells him that she is his wife. Shepherd recalls the party and concludes that Mal has married Saffron in accordance with the customs of the planet. While the crew is entertained by the situation, Mal plans to leave Saffron on the next planet. But out of the blue, he is attacked by Saffron who also attacks Washburne. Who might be the mysterious Mrs. Reynolds?—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

A woman claiming to be Mal's wife appears aboard Serenity. Everyone is shocked by Mal's new wife, Saffron, and reacts differently. Jayne is jealous, Inara is outraged, Kaylee is happy for Mal, while Zoe, Wash, Book, Simon and River don't know what to think.—Azure_Girl
